query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `alert_settings` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `isEnabled` INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `notifyEmail` INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `notifySMS` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `checkIntervalMinutes` INT DEFAULT 360 NOT NULL,
  `recipientEmails` TEXT NULL,
  `recipientPhones` TEXT NULL,
  `alertCooldownHours` INT DEFAULT 24 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `isEnabled` INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `notifyEmail` INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  `notifySMS` INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `checkIntervalMinutes` INT DEFAULT 360 NOT NULL,
  `recipientEmails` TEXT NULL,
  `recipientPhones` TEXT NULL,
  `alertCooldownHours` INT DEFAULT 24 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
